title: Why is getting level 6 or 7 in league of legends so annoying
body: I have played since season 6 (Young player) so maybe a senpai out there can help me out. Why doesn't riot save your S' you get with a champion when you are working towards Mastery level 6 or 7? Why does it only start to count them after level 5. In my opinion, if you have proved yourself to obtain an S even before level 5 you should still be rewarded. Please give me your thoughts and inform me if there is a good reason.

replies.body: You are still rewarded for those scores! Before Mastery rank 5, those scores are giving you mastery experience towards the next rank.
